00008 int DLL_CALLCONV
00009 FreeImageAlgorithms_CopyPaletteToRGBQUAD(FIBITMAP *src, RGBQUAD *palette)
00010 {
00011         if( src == NULL || palette == NULL)
00012                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;      
00013         
00014         // copy the palette
00015         memcpy(palette, FreeImage_GetPalette(src), FreeImage_GetColorsUsed(src) * sizeof(RGBQUAD));
00016 
00017         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS;
00018 }

00021 int DLL_CALLCONV                   
00022 FreeImageAlgorithms_CopyPaletteFromRGBQUAD(FIBITMAP *dst, RGBQUAD *palette)
00023 {
00024         RGBQUAD *dst_palette; 
00025 
00026         if( dst == NULL || palette == NULL || FreeImage_GetBPP(dst) > 8)
00027                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00028 
00029         if((dst_palette = FreeImage_GetPalette(dst)) == NULL) 
00030                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00031 
00032         for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) { 
00033                 dst_palette[i].rgbRed   = palette[i].rgbRed; 
00034                 dst_palette[i].rgbGreen = palette[i].rgbGreen; 
00035                 dst_palette[i].rgbBlue  = palette[i].rgbBlue;
00036         }
00037         
00038         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS;
00039 }

00042 int DLL_CALLCONV                   
00043 FreeImageAlgorithms_CopyPalette(FIBITMAP *src, FIBITMAP *dst)
00044 {
00045         RGBQUAD *src_palette, *dst_palette; 
00046 
00047         if( dst == NULL || src == NULL) {
00048                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00049         }
00050 
00051         if((src_palette = FreeImage_GetPalette(src)) == NULL)
00052                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;      
00053 
00054         if((dst_palette = FreeImage_GetPalette(dst)) == NULL)
00055                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;       
00056 
00057         for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) { 
00058                 dst_palette[i].rgbRed   = src_palette[i].rgbRed; 
00059                 dst_palette[i].rgbGreen = src_palette[i].rgbGreen; 
00060                 dst_palette[i].rgbBlue  = src_palette[i].rgbBlue;
00061         }
00062         
00063         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS;
00064 }
00065 
00066 int DLL_CALLCONV
00067 FreeImageAlgorithms_ReversePaletteEntries(RGBQUAD *palette, unsigned char start, unsigned char size)
00068 {
00069         int i, max_element;
00070 
00071         if(palette == NULL)
00072                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00073 
00074         max_element = (size / 2) - 1;
00075 
00076         for (i=start; i < max_element ; i++) {    
00077 
00078                 INPLACESWAP(palette[i].rgbRed, palette[size - i].rgbRed);
00079                 INPLACESWAP(palette[i].rgbGreen, palette[size - i].rgbGreen);
00080                 INPLACESWAP(palette[i].rgbBlue, palette[size - i].rgbBlue);
00081         }
00082         
00083         return 1;
00084 }

00091         if((palette = FreeImage_GetPalette(src)) == NULL)
00092                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00093         
00094         FreeImageAlgorithms_GetGreyLevelPalette(palette);
00095 
00096         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS;
00097 }

00181 int DLL_CALLCONV
00182 FreeImageAlgorithms_GetGreyLevelPalette(RGBQUAD *palette)
00183 {
00184         if(palette == NULL)
00185                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00186 
00187         for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) { 
00188                 palette[i].rgbRed = i; 
00189                 palette[i].rgbGreen = i; 
00190                 palette[i].rgbBlue = i; 
00191         }
00192         
00193         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS;
00194 }

00197 int DLL_CALLCONV
00198 FreeImageAlgorithms_GetGreyLevelOverLoadPalette(RGBQUAD *palette)
00199 {
00200         if(palette == NULL)
00201                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00202 
00203         int i;
00204 
00205         for (i = 0; i < 245; i++) { 
00206                 palette[i].rgbRed = i; 
00207                 palette[i].rgbGreen = i; 
00208                 palette[i].rgbBlue = i; 
00209         }
00210                         
00211         for (i = 245; i < 250; i++) {
00212                 palette[i].rgbRed = 0; 
00213                 palette[i].rgbGreen = 255; 
00214                 palette[i].rgbBlue = 0;
00215         }
00216                 
00217         for (i = 250; i < 256; i++) {
00218                 palette[i].rgbRed = 255; 
00219                 palette[i].rgbGreen = 0; 
00220                 palette[i].rgbBlue = 0;
00221         }
00222         
00223         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS;
00224 }
00225                   
00226 int DLL_CALLCONV
00227 FreeImageAlgorithms_GetRainBowPalette(RGBQUAD *palette)
00228 {
00229         int i, p1, p2;
00230         
00231         if(palette == NULL)
00232                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00233         
00234         p1 = 256 / 3;
00235         p2 = 2*p1;
00236   
00237         // First do the blue bit
00238         for (i=0; i<p1; i++)
00239                 palette[i].rgbBlue = 255;
00240         
00241         for (i=p1; i<p2; i++)
00242                 palette[i].rgbBlue = 255 + ( (i - p1) * -255 / p1);
00243 
00244         for (i=p2; i<256; i++)
00245                 palette[i].rgbBlue = 0;
00246 
00247 
00248         // Now add the green bit
00249         for (i=0; i<p1; i++)
00250                 palette[i].rgbGreen = (i * 255 / p1);
00251         
00252         for (i=p1; i<p2; i++)
00253                 palette[i].rgbGreen = 255;
00254 
00255         for (i=p2; i<256; i++)
00256                 palette[i].rgbGreen = 255 + ( (i - p2) * -255 / p1);
00257 
00258 
00259         // Now add the red bit
00260         for (i=0; i<p1; i++)
00261                 palette[i].rgbRed = 0;
00262                         
00263         for (i=p1; i<p2; i++)
00264                 palette[i].rgbRed = ((i - p2) * 255 / p1);
00265                 
00266         for (i=p2; i<256; i++)
00267                 palette[i].rgbRed = 255;
00268 
00269         // Now black and white at the ends
00270         palette[0].rgbRed = 0;
00271         palette[0].rgbGreen = 0;
00272         palette[0].rgbBlue = 0;
00273         
00274         palette[255].rgbRed = 255;
00275         palette[255].rgbGreen = 255;
00276         palette[255].rgbBlue = 255;
00277 
00278         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS;
00279 }

00281 
00282 int DLL_CALLCONV
00283 FreeImageAlgorithms_GetLogColourPalette(RGBQUAD *palette)
00284 {       
00285         if(palette == NULL)
00286                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00287 
00288         for (int i = 1; i < 256; i++) {
00289         
00290                 double level = floor ((255.0 * log10((double)i)/log10(255.0)) + 0.5);
00291         
00292                 palette[i].rgbRed = (BYTE) level; 
00293                 palette[i].rgbGreen = (BYTE) level; 
00294                 palette[i].rgbBlue = (BYTE) level; 
00295         }
00296         
00297         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS;
00298 }

00300 
00301 int DLL_CALLCONV
00302 FreeImageAlgorithms_GetFalseColourPalette(RGBQUAD *palette, double wavelength)
00303 {
00304         if(palette == NULL)
00305                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00306 
00307         double red, green, blue;
00308 
00309         //Get RGB components for false colour image for a particular wavelength
00310         //The numbers come from a fortran program that BV found on the internet
00311 
00312         if ((wavelength >= 380) && (wavelength < 440)) {
00313                 red = (440 - wavelength)/(440 - 380);
00314                 green = 0;
00315                 blue = 1;
00316         }
00317         else if ((wavelength >= 440) && (wavelength < 490)) {
00318                 red = 0;
00319                 green = (wavelength - 440)/(490 - 440);
00320                 blue = 1;
00321         }
00322         else if ((wavelength >= 490) && (wavelength < 510)) {
00323                 red = 0;
00324                 green = 1;
00325                 blue = (510 - wavelength )/(510 - 490);
00326         }
00327         else if ((wavelength >= 510) && (wavelength < 580)) {
00328                 red = (wavelength - 510)/(580 - 510);
00329                 green = 1;
00330                 blue = 0;
00331         }
00332         else if ((wavelength >= 580) && (wavelength < 645)) {
00333                 red = 1;
00334                 green = (645 - wavelength )/(645 - 580);
00335                 blue = 0;
00336         }
00337         else if ((wavelength >= 645) && (wavelength < 780)) {
00338                 red = 1;
00339                 green = 0;
00340                 blue = 0;
00341         }
00342         else {            //display as mono
00343         
00344                 FreeImageAlgorithms_GetGreyLevelPalette(palette);
00345                 
00346                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS;
00347         }
00348         
00349         for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) { 
00350                 palette[i].rgbRed = (BYTE) (red * i); 
00351                 palette[i].rgbGreen = (BYTE) (green * i); 
00352                 palette[i].rgbBlue = (BYTE) (blue * i);
00353         }
00354   
00355         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS;
00356 }

00358 
00359 int DLL_CALLCONV
00360 FreeImageAlgorithms_GetOpticalDensityPalette(RGBQUAD *palette, unsigned char red,
00361         unsigned char green, unsigned char blue, int contrast, int entries)
00362 {       
00363         int i;
00364         double h, s, l, slog, c;
00365         unsigned char r, g, b;
00366 
00367         if(palette == NULL)
00368                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00369 
00370         slog = log( 1.0 / (8.0 * contrast) ) / 255.0;            // to scale the od nicely 0-255
00371         
00372         FreeImageAlgorithms_RGBToHSL (red, green, blue, &h, &s, &l);
00373         
00374         for (i=0; i<entries; i++) { 
00375         
00376                 c = exp((double)i * slog); 
00377         
00378                 if (c > 1.0)
00379                         c=1.0;
00380                 else if (c < 0.0)
00381                         c=0.0;
00382         
00383                 FreeImageAlgorithms_HSLToRGB( h, s, c, &r, &g, &b); 
00384         
00385                 palette[i].rgbRed = r; 
00386                 palette[i].rgbGreen = g; 
00387                 palette[i].rgbBlue = b; 
00388         }
00389         
00390         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS;
00391 }
00392 
00393 int DLL_CALLCONV
00394 FreeImageAlgorithms_GetTemperaturePalette(RGBQUAD *palette)
00395 {
00396         int i, p1, p2;
00397 
00398         if(palette == NULL)
00399                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00400         
00401         memset(palette, 0, sizeof(RGBQUAD) * 256);
00402 
00403         p1 = 256 / 2;
00404         p2 = (int) ((3.0 * 256) / 4.0);
00405 
00406         // First do the red bit 
00407         for (i=0; i < 256; i++)
00408                 palette[i].rgbRed = i;
00409                 
00410         // Now add the green bit
00411         for (i=p1; i < 256; i++)
00412                 palette[i].rgbGreen = ((i - p1) * 255 / p1);
00413 
00414         // Now do the blue bit  
00415 
00416         for (i=p2; i < 256; i++)
00417                 palette[i].rgbBlue = ( ((i - p2) * 255) / (256 - p2) );
00418 
00419         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS;
00420 }
00421 
00422 int DLL_CALLCONV
00423 FreeImageAlgorithms_GetSeismicColourPalette(RGBQUAD *palette)
00424 {
00425         int halfway, contrast = 6;
00426 
00427         if(palette == NULL)
00428                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00429 
00430         halfway = 128; 
00431 
00432         FreeImageAlgorithms_GetOpticalDensityPalette(palette, 0, 0, 255, contrast, halfway);
00433 
00434         FreeImageAlgorithms_ReversePaletteEntries(palette, 0, halfway);  
00435 
00436         // Second Half
00437         FreeImageAlgorithms_GetOpticalDensityPalette(&(palette[halfway]), 255, 0, 0, contrast, halfway);  
00438         
00439         
00440         palette[0].rgbRed = 0;
00441         palette[0].rgbGreen = 0;
00442         palette[0].rgbBlue = 0;
00443         
00444         palette[255].rgbRed = 255;
00445         palette[255].rgbGreen = 255;
00446         palette[255].rgbBlue = 255;
00447  
00448         return 0;
00449 }
